import React, { useState } from 'react' import * as emailjs from 'emailjs-com' import Layout from '../components/layout' import { Button, FormFeedback, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input } from 'reactstrap' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' const Contact = () => { const [state, setstate] = useState({ email: '', name: '', subject: '', message: '' }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let templateParams = { from_name: email, to_name: '', subject: subject, message_html: message, } emailjs.send( 'gmail', 'template_XXXXXXXX', templateParams, 'user_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' ) this.resetForm() } const resetForm = () => { this.setState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', }) } const handleChange = (param, e) => { this.setState({ [param]: e.target.value }) } return ( <>

Get in Touch

 ) } export default Contact
